scripts.format:rust: bash -lc 'for dir in wasm/*_signer; do (cd "$dir" && cargo fmt); done'
scripts.format:rust:check: bash -lc 'for dir in wasm/*_signer; do (cd "$dir" && cargo fmt -- --check); done'
scripts.lint:rust: bash -lc 'for dir in wasm/*_signer; do (cd "$dir" && cargo clippy --all-targets); done'
scripts.lint:rust:strict: bash -lc 'for dir in wasm/*_signer; do (cd "$dir" && cargo clippy --all-targets -- -D warnings); done'
scripts.check: pnpm -s lint && pnpm -s format:check && pnpm -s type-check && pnpm -s format:rust:check && pnpm -s lint:rust && pnpm -s check:signing-architecture && pnpm -s check:signer-parity
scripts.fix: pnpm -s format && pnpm -s lint:fix && pnpm -s format:rust
scripts.examples:vite: concurrently --kill-others --names server,docs "pnpm run server" "pnpm -C examples/tatchi-docs dev"
scripts.examples:vite-iphone: concurrently --kill-others --names server,docs "pnpm run server:iphone" "pnpm -C examples/tatchi-docs dev:iphone"
scripts.server:prepare-sdk: test -f sdk/dist/esm/server/index.js && test -f sdk/dist/types/server/src/index.d.ts || (pnpm -C sdk exec tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && pnpm -C sdk build:rolldown)
scripts.server: pnpm -s server:prepare-sdk && pnpm -C examples/relay-server postgres:up && HOST=127.0.0.1 EXPECTED_ORIGIN=https://example.localhost EXPECTED_WALLET_ORIGIN=https://wallet.example.localhost pnpm -C examples/relay-server dev
scripts.server:3-relays: pnpm -s server:prepare-sdk && pnpm -C examples/relay-server postgres:up && HOST=127.0.0.1 EXPECTED_ORIGIN=https://example.localhost EXPECTED_WALLET_ORIGIN=https://wallet.example.localhost pnpm -C examples/relay-server dev:threshold:3relays
scripts.server:iphone: pnpm -s server:prepare-sdk && pnpm -C examples/relay-server postgres:up && HOST=0.0.0.0 EXPECTED_ORIGIN=https://pta-m4.local EXPECTED_WALLET_ORIGIN=https://pta-m4.local:8443 pnpm -C examples/relay-server dev
